Posted By: MarkJR (4/17/2009 12:23:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
When they said it may be better then [Kitchen Finks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kitchen Finks ) they didn't mean by the life gain alone.
  
This creature is unblockable. That is what MIGHT make it better.
  
But personally I see no reason to compare the two.
  
They are extremely different.
  
   
The unbloackability suits me more though.

Posted By: RickMaadi179 (5/21/2009 9:46:21 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I kinda like how his abilities work together.
  
He's too expensive to just block a weenie and die, so he gives you some extra life to compensate for it (and hits opponent every turn).
  
Or takes burn spell in the face instead of you, which means even bigger life advantage.
  
One way or another, the extra 4 life means he will often be more useful than phantom warrior.
  
Well, in UW decks anyway.
